MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a further update for customers in the G46 postcode area of Glasgow. Our teams will be back on site early hours in the morning to continue repairs. We will need access to each property affected and will come door to door. This is essential to allow us to complete the repairs required. We will make every effort to continue to update you on the progress of the fault repairs. We now expect your supply to be restored by 4.00pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:54 AM on Saturday, 20 March 2021
